pr_title: Initial version of reactive DB2 SQL client

timeline.message: Add DRDA code ported from Apache Derby
Add all TCK tests with only passing tests enabled for now
Update README with information on how to test
Parse prepared statement input and output columns separately
Tolerate benign Sqlcodes for closing connections and updates with no updated rows
Eliminate CCSIDManager usage as an instance
Prepare DB2 module for initial PR

timeline.bodyText: can we use the Numeric Vert.x type to replace BigDecimal like other projects do? it's useful to be used in a polyglot environment.
timeline.author: BillyYccc

replies.bodyText: good point, I've pushed another commit that resolves this so now testDecimal and testNumeric are not overridden in the DB2 TCK tests

timeline.bodyText: so the protocol used depends on the interpretation of the SQL query by the client ?
timeline.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: The protocol used is always DRDA, but yes we need to send different commands over the wire for an update vs. query statement. I believe that we technically could use the same commands for both, but if we flow the more specific commands then the DB can make some optimizations on its end
replies.author: aguibert
